title.narrative: Inclusive Education for Children with Special Needs in Uzbekistan

description.narrative: The project will develop a process aiming at achieving in the long term the following overall objective: to contribute to the social inclusion in Uzbekistan.At the end of the project it is expected to have paved the way to improve the quality of education for children with special needs age 2 10 and promote their integration in the mainstream kindergartens and primary schools in Uzbekistan (specific objective).

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: submission of the final draft Strategy for adoption

comment.narrative: submission of the final draft Strategy for adoption

actual.value: The Policy concepts have been adopted; the Strategy and AP have been generally endorsed but the adoption is pending.
